subject: Re: perl sort query
body:
> $ perl -le'
> print for @x = qw/200610011733 200610012057 200610011029 200610010928
> 200610011220/, "";
>
> print for sort @x;
> '
> 200610011733
> 200610012057
> 200610011029
> 200610010928
> 200610011220

>
the time is the last 4 digits (hhmm)
so the first is 17:33
then 20:57
then 10:29
then 09:28

i want them chronologically
ie
09:28
10:29
17:33
 20:57
